thread.section_title: www.arguscarhire.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.arguscarhire.com | www.arguscarhire.com
thread.title: PAUL Mason

author: PAUL Mason
title: PAUL Mason
text: We have just rented a a car from top car , in Gran Canaria booked through Argus., the car was as advertised, clean and in good condition, what did annoy us was , we booked the full to full fuel policy, when we got the keys we was told it was 3/4 full and asked to bring back 3/4 full, the minute we d I've off the forecourt the gauge dropped to Just over half! Also when returning the car it's not easy trying to fill to 3/4, we ended up taking the car back with much more fuel than when we collected . If the policy is full to full that's what it should be .!
